statements: SELECT * FROM tumors;
SELECT tumor_type, tumor_size FROM tumors WHERE tumor_location = 'Brain';
SELECT tumor_id, treatment_plan FROM tumors ORDER BY tumor_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM tumors WHERE tumor_size > 5;
SELECT tumor_location, COUNT(*) AS num_tumors FROM tumors GROUP BY tumor_location;
SELECT * FROM tumors WHERE tumor_id = 1;
SELECT tumor_id, tumor_size, tumor_type FROM tumors WHERE tumor_location = 'Brain' ORDER BY tumor_type DESC;
SELECT tumor_id, tumor_size, treatment_plan FROM tumors WHERE tumor_type = 'Lung' AND tumor_location = 'Chest';
SELECT AVG(tumor_size) AS avg_size, COUNT(*) AS total_tumors FROM tumors WHERE tumor_location LIKE '%stomach%';
SELECT * FROM tumors WHERE tumor_size > 5.0 ORDER BY tumor_size ASC, tumor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Tumor_Characteristics WHERE tumor_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, tumor_size FROM Tumor_Characteristics ORDER BY tumor_size DESC;
SELECT tumor_location FROM Tumor_Characteristics WHERE tumor_type = 'Benign';
SELECT * FROM Treatment_Plans WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT treatment_description, plan_date FROM Treatment_Plans WHERE planned_by = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY plan_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Tumor_Characteristics WHERE tumor_type = 'Breast' AND tumor_size > 5.0;
SELECT tumor_id, tumor_type, tumor_location FROM Tumor_Characteristics WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_plans FROM Treatment_Plans GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_plans > 3;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_description, plan_date FROM Treatment_Plans WHERE treatment_description LIKE '%chemotherapy%';
SELECT * FROM Tumor_Characteristics ORDER BY tumor_location ASC, tumor_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM TumorImages WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT image_id, tumor_type FROM TumorImages WHERE tumor_size > 2.5
SELECT tumor_type, tumor_size, image_id FROM TumorImages ORDER BY tumor_size DESC
SELECT image_data FROM TumorImages WHERE patient_id = 'aabbccdd-1234-5678-8765-432112221100'
SELECT * FROM TumorImages WHERE tumor_type LIKE '%carcinoma%'
SELECT image_id, image_data, patient_id, tumor_size, tumor_type FROM TumorImages WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT image_id, patient_id, tumor_type FROM TumorImages WHERE tumor_size > 1.5 ORDER BY tumor_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM TumorImages WHERE tumor_type LIKE 'Breast%' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(tumor_size) AS max_tumor_size, MIN(tumor_size) AS min_tumor_size FROM TumorImages;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(image_id) AS image_count FROM TumorImages GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(image_id) > 1 ORDER BY image_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM TumorImages WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT image_url, date_taken FROM TumorImages ORDER BY date_taken DESC;
SELECT tumor_type, tumor_size FROM TumorCharacteristics WHERE tumor_location = 'Brain';
SELECT treatment_description, start_date FROM TreatmentPlan WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT image_id, analyst_name, analysis_date FROM ImageAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM TumorImages WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY date_taken DESC;
SELECT image_url, date_taken FROM TumorImages WHERE patient_id = 200 AND date_taken >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_id, patient_id, date_taken FROM TumorImages WHERE date_taken BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT tumor_type, tumor_size, tumor_location FROM TumorCharacteristics WHERE tumor_grade > 2;
SELECT analyst_name, analysis_date FROM ImageAnalysis WHERE analysis_result = 'Positive' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM tumors WHERE tumor_type = 'Melanoma';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT image_name, image_resolution, capture_date FROM images WHERE image_type = 'X-Ray' ORDER BY capture_date DESC;
SELECT treatment_type, treatment_date, treatment_description FROM treatments WHERE treatment_type = 'Chemotherapy' LIMIT 5;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital_name FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM tumors WHERE tumor_size > 5.0 ORDER BY tumor_location DESC;
SELECT image_name, image_type, capture_date FROM images WHERE patient_id = 10 AND capture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY capture_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND admission_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT treatment_type, treatment_date, treatment_description FROM treatments WHERE patient_id = 15 AND treatment_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital_name, contact_number FROM doctors WHERE specialization LIKE '%Surgeon%' ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
